Title: Myson Floortec MPRT RF radio frequency programmable thermostat
Description: Slimline and easy to use, the intuitive Myson Floortec MPRT RF programmable thermostat uses Smart Start technology to help users save up to 10% on heating bills by adjusting start-up to meet required temperatures at chosen times. This smart self-learning function makes heating more efficient, responding to climate conditions for comfort and convenience. Compatible with Myson Floortec underfloor heating systems and connectable to a 24V hard-wired wiring centre, this single thermostat offers control over several loops with simple 7 day programming and a choice of temperature settings.
category: Heating/Underfloor Heating/Water Underfloor Heating/Water Underfloor Heating.csv -> Myson Floortec MPRT RF radio frequency programmable thermostat

Title: JG Underfloor LowFit foiled panel 16mm 12mm pipe
Description: Designed for installation over existing concrete or timber flooring, this JG LowFit 1250 x 600mm foil panel has a 16mm depth to help minimise height gain. With a light weight and high compressive strength, this sturdy panel is pre-grooved with return bends, easily cut with a small knife, so there's no need for additional panel variations. Offering fast, straightforward installation, LowFit panels include foil moulded into the straight grooves for improved system performance.
category: Heating/Underfloor Heating/Water Underfloor Heating/Water Underfloor Heating.csv -> JG Underfloor LowFit foiled panel 16mm 12mm pipe

Title: JG Underfloor Lowfit castelled panel 20mm 15mm pipe
Description: JG LowFit™ 20mm Castellated Panels are designed to provide a high output, low height, screeded underfloor system. The 20mm panel has equally spaced castellations at 50mm to allow 15mm pipe to be clipped in securely and accurately as per design specifications Installation of the panels is fast and simple as it features an overlapping alignment system for simple hassle-free panel laying, as well as a super strong adhesive backing. This allows for the panel to be installed directly onto the existing sub floor structure. The open grid design ensures the screed layer poured on top flows smoothly and evenly over the panel.

Title: JG Underfloor Lowfit fibr mesh panel 16mm 12mm pipe
Description: Providing a high output in low height screed floor underfloor heating systems, JG Underfloor LowFit 16mm low profile castellated panels feature equally spaced castellations at 50mm, allowing for the secure clipping in of 12mm pipe. With an overlapping alignment system, LowFit offers quick, easy installation and features strong adhesive backing for reliable adherence to an existing sub floor structure. Title: JG Underfloor JG Underfloor wired heating controls  JGWC4 wiring centr 240V
Description: An all-in-one junction box for underfloor heating systems, the JG Underfloor 240v wiring centre centralises controls with eight zone connections. Easy to mount and wire thanks to its labelled circuit board, this wiring centre incorporates all hard-wired connections for zone valves, pumps, actuators and thermostats, making the connection and control of additional radiators or hot water motorised valves simple. For additional convenience, the JG Underfloor wiring centre can be fully controlled via smartphone using the JG Underfloor gateway and app.

Title: Myson Floortec 3D large tackernail 58mm
Description: This 58mm long Myson Floortec 3D Tackernail is ultra-strong for the quick and reliable anchoring of Floortec underfloor heating pipework, even in solid floors. To use, the pipe is positioned and the Tackernail is simply installed over the pipe using a Myson Floortec Tacker tool.
